item.title: Memento [GoF]
item.description: Let’s say you got a cookie from a repository your granny and you’re not sure if you like the new taste. Wouldn’t it be cool if you could just try it and revoke the operation first bite if you don’t like it? In the world of OOP thats a easy job which can be handled by the so called memento pattern - you just save the inner state of the object within a memento object and revoke you actions whenever you like…
